website_summaries.verdict: We appreciate the soft foot pocket and open heel on this snugly fitting design, its range of stylish colors, and full-blade dive fin for additional thrust.
cons: These larger dive fins will take up more real estate in your luggage

customer_reviews.title: Proflex FX Fin
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Used for 9 days in Hawai'i shore snorkeling. Also purchased US Divers Fin leash (additional purchase) to reduce chance of losing these nice fins. The fins will fit in most 25-27 inch luggage. Glad I got this larger version of fin--allows comfortable snorkeling with a slow steady kick. With smaller travel fins you have to kick like crazy. Con: Getting in and out of the water, more cumbersome of course. Had to sand down rough edges and manufacturing bumps on the yellow plastic sides to reduce the chance of getting cut or abraded while handling and swimming.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs of these. One large, one medium. I typically wear a 9.5 in men's shoes, the medium ended up fitting extremely snug. They would work if you do not intend on wearing anything else with them. The large was just a bit large to wear barefoot, but would be prefect with any sort of water/neoprene socks. They work as intended and I've owned them for about 8 months and have had no issues with the quality or durability. I would buy more in the future and would easily recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Size is important
customer_reviews.text: I love the fins, really makes swimming faster easier while snorkeling Easy to use One comment. I wear 11 1/2 with a narrow flat foot , I purchased large. Fin is long enough but very difficult to put on and very tight and uncomfortable at the top .. just too tight. I feel if you have a high arch you may not be able to get on your foot That said a very good value and works great
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: so easy to take off /on in water
customer_reviews.text: My size is 10.5-11, so these fins of 10.5 - 11.5 are just tiny bit loose but feet are not squeezed/pressed, so easy to take off /on in water. Owing to the side openings it is SO easy on leg muscles, powerful propelling. I call them awesome. Best ever fins I had. They r great for both regular swimming and snorkeling. Impressed with a low price for such a quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Good snorkeling fin
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of fins. I've used them for scuba training. They functioned well. Now that I know better wouldn't recommend for scuba since usually you wear boots and open backed fins however they perform fine. And I'm going to enjoy using them for snorkeling. I ordered the 9.5-11.5 and I'm a 11.5 shoe size. If I have to stand in shallow water for a few minutes my feet start to cramp because they're a bit snug. Once in motion it's fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Boselly

customer_reviews.title: Not for use with dive boots
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems on point. I really don't have a complaint on these, but a warning. Do not expect to be able to use a set of boots with these fins. I purchased these as travel fins for snorkeling only, so they'll do the trick, but the foot pocket is an exact fit to my foot. I wear a 10.5 mens shoe, so I purchased the large. I would have liked to at least wear a set of 3.5 mm boots with them for walking on rocks from the shore, but for the comfort aspect, i won't need them.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: They fit way smaller than the advertised size. By time I got to use them I couldn't send them back because it's outside of the return window. So now i have a pair of fins that's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Ran big, definitely a fin that must be used with a booty or sock
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these fins, but they were a bit big on me. These need to be used with a dive sock/boot. They can be adjusted but it gave me the impression my feet would cramp up when using these. I returned these and I had to pay for the shipping label, which I have gotten used to the pre-paid label from most Amazon sellers, so I pretty much paid 10$ to try these on only to return them. Not too happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra AE

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Fins came well packed and in brand new condition. Appear to be well built. Tried them on, size was perfect and they are fairly comfortable. There is some pressure on my big toes, but I'm guessing all fins would be the same. Clasp is a bit difficult to release, but definitely well built and sturdy. Make sure you are OK with the length, these are full size fins, not short traveling fins. Look forward to using them!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great travel size but no kick power
customer_reviews.text: I used these for travel as I didn't want to lug a large set of find, they fit well and were very comfortable but I struggled to get power in my kicks, I think I kicked twice as hard as everyone in my dive group. It was so noticeable that for the second dive onwards I used a pair I borrowed from the dive co. Perfect for snorkeling, and great for travel. Will take my regular fins next time.
customer_reviews.author: RMMc

customer_reviews.title: Great Fins, but Get a Size Bigger
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have was sizing. I got the large, which, I'm assuming, is stated to work up to 11.5 U.S. shoe size. This is very much not the case. I wear a size 11, and that's roomy for me, and my feet BARELY fit in these things. It was a VERY snug fit, with my large toe poking out the hole in the end. It was still usable, but they have their sizes way off, and I'd go for the extra large if I could do it all over again. Still, I was able to get them on, and these fins worked pretty darn well for me. I could go pretty fast and they were fairly flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight scuba fins
customer_reviews.text: Very quick shipping, excellent customer service. Order a size up.. I am a women's size 8 which is a small according to their chart but they were too tight. I was able to return and received a replacement pair very quickly. These fins are very comfortable but my favorite feature is that they are very lightweight which is crucial when you're packing for a trip. My only complaint is that they don't have quick release/removable straps which makes it more difficult to remove them at the end of your dive.
customer_reviews.author: A Jones

customer_reviews.title: The right size and weight for travel & snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: It was time to replace my full foot fins that I use for snorkeling. I tried a smaller, adjustable open heel, travel snorkel fin, but it required a lot more energy to swim. I tested these out in my pool & they are much easier. They are a couple of inches shorter than my old ones. They measure 22.5" from tip to tip. They fit fine with the full mask snorkel in the bag I bought for our upcoming trip. I ordered the Large Men's (I wear a 10.5 or 11 dress shoe depending on the cut). They fit just right. I can't comment on the long term durability, but the design looks like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Burnette

customer_reviews.title: 9 years on, they are still great
customer_reviews.text: I bought size large in 2011 and have size 10 feet about D or E width. They fit very well. I use them every year or two when I travel. They are still in perfect condition. They propel me well in the water with minimal chafing. On the rare occasion that I have had rubbing, I use Band-Aid Brand Hydro Seal Waterproof All Purpose Adhesive Bandages for Wound Care or Blisters, 10 ct with good success.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: The mesh carrying bag is great, not too small that you can't get wet
customer_reviews.text: The mesh carrying bag is great, not too small that you can't get wet, sandy fins back in. Adjusting the straps was more difficult than I hoped, especially if you're already underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand - Excellent Performance!
customer_reviews.text: My old fins were 10 years old and I still liked them until a strap broke and I couldn't get that replaced. I reluctantly ordered these US Diver's fins and am amazed. They seem MUCH lighter, way lower mass and more powerful (even tho they are the same size as my old ones). VERY pleased. I should have known they'd be great. I learned to dive as a kid with a US Diver's "Aqualung" which was made in 1957. Their stuff is the best!
customer_reviews.author: ecgeorgia

customer_reviews.title: Great in a variety of environments
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 5 sets of these fins and love them. They work great in a variety of environments and my family has used them in open ocean, no current, stronger current, grottos and blue hole snorkels. We have them for our kids ages 11-16 as well as for myself and husband. The size is perfect for packing in a standard suitcase also!
customer_reviews.author: Bliss Pastry

customer_reviews.title: They stay on! Function well and just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 10.5 yet closer to an 11 Mens. These fit absolutely perfectly. The key is easy on, stay on. Even through some tough waters today they never felt as if they were going to slip off. I have lost two clips over the last month with competitors that are double the price. A real deal here --value and function. Now we gotta see how they go for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: mcm

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I will open acknowledge Im not a huge snorkeling fan nor am I a strong swimmer, but every year my partner’s family goes on a 7 day snorkeling trip. So this year I described to go all out and buy everything I could possibly imagine that would make my trip better. These fins where a big part of my happiness because of them I was easily able to keep up with every one else in the group. I would recommend getting some flipper socks to go with them, it seems to make them just the right snugness.
customer_reviews.author: BB-P

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. For me very comfortable even without socks or ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. For me very comfortable even without socks or booties of whatever the term is- bare foot they work for me. Really light, the flexibility is about perfect as far as my use has gone- I'm not trying to power straight up or down, mostly moving horizontally- they are tremendous for that. One thing that is an absolute gas is using them on your back- really fast.
customer_reviews.author: JW 801

customer_reviews.title: Nice fins at a good price
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are nice fins. The arrived quickly. I have only tested them in a pool but so far I am pleased. I wear a size 10.5 shoe and I purchased the large size. When I first tried them on the seemed too big but they do stay on without issue and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James Parchert

customer_reviews.title: Maximum Fins for Carry On Luggage !
customer_reviews.text: These are great fins performance wise, I've been trying them in a pool shootout with my old "travel fins" that I took on a snorkeling vacation to Central America, and these fit well and have very good thrust without strain on legs and joints (and I am in my 60s). One GREAT advantage is that these are 21 1/4 inches long from heel to tip (medium, note the product dimension of 14" length given is wrong). US air carriers allow 22" length for a carry on bag, making these a fine choice for that tropical vacation, much better than my short fins. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... not for the item its self as its in perfect working order and they work just as described the ...
customer_reviews.text: the one star is not for the item its self as its in perfect working order and they work just as described the one star is because i payed full retail and got a pair of fins with sand in them ... out of the box already had sand in them i wouldn't have minded buying a used pair of these at a used price but paying full retail for a used pair kinda stinks
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Super Fins!
customer_reviews.text: They work so well! I purchased the medium and wear a 9 1/2 women’s shoe and find then to be loose. I wear a sock in the water and they are great. I guess it depends on your width ect. They are quite the work-out. I feel such a stretch in my thighs and calf’s from these gems! Wonderful purchase to accelerate my swimming routine!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit nice and don't rub the skin off your bare feet. Used them five days a week for about four months and there's abbrasion markings on the fin itself but my feet were fine. Overall it's a good investment if you're swimming alot.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: I'm 185 lbs and I would recommend them for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: These work well for snorkeling. I used them for a week. I'm 185 lbs and I would recommend them for snorkeling. Easy to carry around. They are lighter weight and material than diving fins. I would not recommend them for diving. That would be too much to expect from these fins as they are not quite beefy enough for that much equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for youth and adult
customer_reviews.text: I got the gray color, which are different than the photo shows. Mine have an adjustable strap on the back. Fit my son who is 10 and wears a boys 4 shoe and also fit me with a women’s size 7.5 with room to spare. Soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K Ming

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off. These run small!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 shoe across multiple brands, so I purchased the size 8-9.5 of these fins. Unfortunately, they are so small my toes stick out the end. I guess by 8-9.5 they really meant 7-8. I have no idea where they got their sizing from, but it is frustratingly inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Prepared in Grand Turk Snorkeling over the WALL
customer_reviews.text: i used these to swim on vacation in the bahamas this past week. The waters were choppy, but with these fins, it made going against the current a breeze. I also used them snorkeling in Grand Turk. They stayed on my feet and were not chaffing my heels at all. They are very comfortable and a hundred percent better than the fins provided for you on the snorkeling trips.
customer_reviews.author: Seriously08

customer_reviews.title: Great for my wide foot
customer_reviews.text: These fins fit so well. So comfortable. I snorkeled first a few hours a day. I normally wear a 10 ee shoe. One thing I really loved was the cut out portion of the fin. It made holding them a breeze and helped me hold one while putting on the other.
customer_reviews.author: Chitty

customer_reviews.title: The fit is super comfortable, great quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these fins. Fit and feel super comfy and for the $$$ you cant beat them. I plan to buy a second set for use by my guests at the lake house. Dont hesitate! These are a real quality designed fin. Very light and confortable.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a professional diver
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and my husband ended up borrowing them since his older ones cracked. He loved them and said he really felt the difference in quality. These were a great buy and worked really well. We packed them with us to take on vacation and both of them used them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Toney

customer_reviews.title: Too small for booties
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be excellent quality fins, but I will be returning them. The large size foot opening is too small, height and width, to slide my foot in with a 3mm bootie. Barefoot, the strap slides off my heel.
customer_reviews.author: NotBob

customer_reviews.title: Good for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a recent trip to the Caribbean. My wife's been using the stumpy short travel fins, but she had a hard time moving with those. We upgraded to these new fins, and she was quite pleased with them. Good fit, adjustable. (She's a size 8)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Fins for diving AND snorkeling/ especially for kids
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fins for diving and snorkeling. My kids are 13 & 11 and are advanced open water divers. These are perfect for them and recommended by dive shops throughout Philippines and Thailand. Just got back from dive trip and they went down to 30 meters in some current with no issues. They both use with and without booties which makes them perfect for traveling. FYI: We paired them with Mares Rubber Sole Classic 5mm Dive Boots (size 4men) Which were also perfect for diving/ exploring.
customer_reviews.author: a parr

customer_reviews.title: Size stamped on fin is false
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is completely False. I’ve been diving for more than 20 years and have bought US Divers products previously. These fins are “quality rejects” or the size stamp was placed on the wrong fins. I ordered men’s large (10-13) even though I wear 8.5. Unfortunately didn’t try them on until after I arrived at my dive vacation destination, on the dive boat I found they were not the size stamped on the fin. In the photo is my size 8.5 New Balance shoe next to supposedly 10-13 fin. Thank God Amazon allows returns.
customer_reviews.author: Cat T

customer_reviews.title: Great fins - crappy bag
customer_reviews.text: Great fins for snorkeling. I would highly recommend them. The bag that it comes with sucks because it has not carrying straps, pockets or zippers of any sort. If you want a better bag and kit overall i would go to Walmart or search online for U.S. Divers snorkel kit that has a nicer bag and snorkel set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fin for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I have scuba fins (which require a neoprene sock) and I have bought travel fins (smaller, lighter fins). These fins are absolutely the perfect fin for snorkeling. Lightweight (3.1 pounds for the pair), totally comfortable (med/large for my size 8W foot), and best of all, I glide effortlessly through the Caribbean waters. The scuba fins were too heavy for travel and the travel fins were too small for me the keep up with my partner. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent snorkel fins
customer_reviews.text: U.S. Divers Proflex FX Fins are excellent for snorkeling (I do not scuba). No chance to try them before our vacation. When I did get to try them in the water they fit perfectly, were flexible on the first use, and felt very comfortable. I wore them barefoot--I wear a size 6 shoe--and had no rubbing. Snorkeled every day on our 6 day vacation. Two days I was in the water for more than an hour at a time. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Quality good, good fit for my 8.5  very wide foot
customer_reviews.text: Take it on cruise ships and use them on islands visited in carribean. Twice so far, no problems. Some mark left on top of one foot, but other than that, I can do an hour with no issues. Kind of large for traveling in suitcase, but I make due as the smaller ones have poor reviews as functioning well. This one propels me well, with moderate effort.
customer_reviews.author: Truth and nothing but ...

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I only got pool work in so far but hopefully I can get some ocean time to give a better review later. So far these are very good and very fast. I was moving much quicker through the pool than I was with the previous cheapo pair I had.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I like them. I have bought four pair over the years. They are comfortable. They do crack over time. Fortunately, they are not expensive. When they eventually crack, I buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: THMAS

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Fit well comfortable Best feature opening on the sides easy to hold on to when getting in and out of ocean
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for snorkeling.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. They fit me comfortably. I wear a mens size ten. Smaller than diving fins so they fit in my 48 liter osprey pack leaving plenty of room for clothes. I would not use them for scuba as you need bigger fins for that. Took them to Indonesia for snorkeling and it saved money so i did not have to rent.
customer_reviews.author: Scout40

customer_reviews.title: No heal, adjustable strap.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. They don’t have a healed fin, liked pictured, but use an adjustable strap. Which I like better
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and they're easy to take on and off but they stay on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and they're easy to take on and off but they stay on the foot extremely well. They have a very attractive design compared to most fins.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Light and flexible, the size fit well
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to use them yet, but they seem light and flexible so you don't get tired too fast and enjoy more your snorkeling experience. The size fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Cheap/garbage
customer_reviews.text: The fins are junk. I definitely would not wear while scuba diving. The fins pictured are not the fins that I received. The fin straps constantly come off or loosen up while snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie 2 Hottie

customer_reviews.title: Item sent not what was shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows a solid foot cup on the fin which is what I was looking for, but what arrived was a fin with a strap. Item returned.
customer_reviews.author: TCR

customer_reviews.title: Nice Diving Fins
customer_reviews.text: I am not a Scuba Diver, just a Snorkeler, I can go like 30 or more feet deep in the sea pretty fast with this fins. I do like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jose (Ruben) Romero

customer_reviews.title: comfortable fins.
customer_reviews.text: i mainly use these for snorkling on cruise ships. i was looking for rocket fins but ended up with these they are comfortable to use and increase safety when snorkling by yourself
customer_reviews.author: Ray L. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for snorkeling which is what I purchased them for. They run generous I originally ordered my shoe size but ended up getting a size smaller so the were not loose. Made well and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Anahid Pagalos

customer_reviews.title: Great for working hamstrings ...
customer_reviews.text: Have a pair of zoomer-type fins as well ... work different muscles. Love the design makes them very easy to carry!
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged. Had to Return.
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak to the quality of these fins, because I haven't used them. Unfortunately, they arrived damaged with the straps on the back of the fin broken. I might reorder, but this is concerning if this occurred prior to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkeling fins!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a recent snorkeling trip and they are great! They provided good power without tiring my legs. The fit was perfect, no blisters on my heels or toes.
customer_reviews.author: kfcee

customer_reviews.title: Swinm like a fish
customer_reviews.text: I got these to take with us when we go snorkeling. I can swim faster with them than without. They make a great addition to my feet in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: needed a good fin to go snorkeling fits the bill perfect, not sure how durable yet
customer_reviews.author: Clinton M

customer_reviews.title: When ordering from Amazon I expect a new product!!
customer_reviews.text: These fins may be good or not. I don't know. I expect a new product when I order from Amazon. As seen in the pictures I received a well used set of fins. Not only have they been clearly used before. They are still covered in beach sand. I am returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Davis

customer_reviews.title: SO comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable, and great for snorkeling. Didn't want to use my diving fins for snorkeling due to size and booties, but these were great replacement and lightweight. Easy on and off, and easy clean-up from sand exposure. Mesh bag fair quality--just a cord rather than handle, but functional.
customer_reviews.author: Helt2006

customer_reviews.title: Great fins!
customer_reviews.text: Great fins. Fit well for size 9-1/2 -10 foot. Comfortable. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K.Troche

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fins for Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our trip to Hawaii (Maui) and they worked perfectly. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Techie Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, high quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, high quality product! Super comfortable! With these on I can swim very easily and very fast with little effort. As a result I spend a lot more time swimming as I don't get tired as quickly. It's a lot more fun and enjoyable overall to swim with these on. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emperor of Nerds

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs of these for a trip to Bora-Bora. We used them for some amazing snorkeling. We've snorkeled before using the tour guides' equipment, and what a difference! My husband commented that he thought he could wear these all day and not feel at all uncomfortable. They slip on easily, but never feel loose or floppy. They're light-weight, so we didn't worry about them with our luggage weight limits (less allowable weight in Tahiti than the US!) They're quite flexible and make swimming quite easy...but the BEST feature is definitely the comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great item. It was shipped in the original packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great item. It was shipped in the original packaging, with a shipping labeled slapped on it. By the time I got it, the fins were falling out, the box was crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Great for snorkeling! Went to the BVIs and bought these for the whole family. They were light weight to pack, saved us an expensive rental fee and loved the closed heel. We were so glad we went with the closed heel as there are so many areas that have coral and spiny urchins.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great fins at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day and enjoy flying just at the surface of our lake!
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Scotti

customer_reviews.title: Size matters!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 13 wide and these fit great! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Beware of plastic parts - Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these fins 1 star because, while they are affordable and fit well, within 3 days of use the plastic buckle broke off and now cannot be worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Took these to the Bahamas for snorkeling and then used them locally at a pond here in Rhode island. They work great and with these on I can keep up with sharks... Well maybe not sharks but I can go fast
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: excellent fins
customer_reviews.text: Just fit, as expected since I was on the high end of the range (11.5). Really good in the water for speed and control. Feet felt fine after wearing even though it has been years since I have used fins.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: These are very good for snorkeling or free diving but don't think you ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very good for snorkeling or free diving but don't think you can scuba dive with them. My instructor wouldn't allow them since they don't have a locking strap in the back. They were very good for snorkeling, however.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and way better than a rental
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in the ocean for the first time I ever snorkeled. Fit great even with a swim sock (highly recommended).
customer_reviews.author: cire

customer_reviews.title: Love my fins!
customer_reviews.text: A friend had a pair and let me use them. As a novice swimmer/diver, these fins made me feel like a professional. Extremely comfortable and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Works a description says. No frills just the basics and at a great value
customer_reviews.author: EngineerEagan

customer_reviews.title: Loved Them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a recent vacation to Hawaii. I used them 5 times over the course of the week and really liked them. They were very comfortable, and I felt like they worked very well. Having only used rental flippers before, I was amazed at how much lighter these are. I also love the cut-out in them. I'm sure it's designed for water-flow, but it actually made for extremely convenience handles as well. Well worth the price I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Beaugrand

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Vacation
customer_reviews.text: got them for a vacation and am looking forward to spending extra time in the surf with these.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: They one lasted 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: They only lasted 5 months. The one I worn on my right foot split at the big toe and ran to the sole then the other side did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: E  Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: They work well in the water, I love how they look, and they are very streamlined.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hemker

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. I'll buy a second pair. I bought these fins to replace my old US Divers fins which recently cracked after many years of service. As other reviewers have posted, these fins have some flex which might reduce some power. But they work for me.
customer_reviews.author: THMAS

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: Not mush to say.... great fins for surface swimming. Light yet sturdy and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: rbaustx

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice but small in size if wearing boots. Get one size karger6.
customer_reviews.author: hootfour

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable option for serious snorkeling.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I use them twice a week for work and they are the best fins I've tried. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable fins
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, are comfortable and swim nicely. We'll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9.5 shoe and I found the large size 9.5 to 11.5 fits well. I can move through the water very quickly. However they aren't very rigid and will flex a bit when you're first trying to move. I find that I have to slowly build momentum and then I can cruise through the water with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jfalcon

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not stiff enough. Good for a swimming pool but not the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: benny

customer_reviews.title: Bendy, They Are
customer_reviews.text: OK, you should definitely pay attention to the "flex" in the product name because these flex a LOT under hard kicking. They bend like noodles when I try doing a big scissors kick with them. Seem OK for flutter kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Sofar perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9.5 shoe. So I ordered a large. Perfect fit, because I wear diving boots with all my fins. I've taken these out for 8 hours of snorkeling our local river, with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: ethan

customer_reviews.title: ... diving fins but for the price this on is pretty good. It helps me swim in the water
customer_reviews.text: So I admit that I know nothing about diving fins but for the price this on is pretty good. It helps me swim in the water...... what else is it supposed to do. The only thing is that I get blisters on my toes after about 30 minutes of use. Do I need special socks? I dunno.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good diving, snorkeling fin
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to take with me on a dive/snorkeling trip and they worked great. I am a 10.5 US, and the 9.5-11.5 fit just right. There were no apparent flaws, and the fin worked just fine through multiple dives and snorkeling excursions. They are light and easily strapped to a backpack for day trips. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Work great in the water. Used already in a dozen of snorkle adventures in Jamaica and they are holding up. Got no blisters and they keep me moving.
customer_reviews.author: Erik G. Coxe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He loved them. Fit great.
customer_reviews.author: MamawH

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Took these to Fiji. Can't tell you how impressed I was. Great fit as they didn't slide off or rub blisters after hours of snorkeling. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Landers

customer_reviews.title: Same quality as Cressi at half the price.
customer_reviews.text: As good as my Cressi fins at half the price. You will probably want fin socks since sand in there gets super annoying very fast. They have enough give where they won't destroy your legs but are stiff enough to properly move you. All around a nice fin.
customer_reviews.author: B Wallace

customer_reviews.title: These diving fins are very comfortable and I would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: These diving fins are very comfortable and I would buy them again, although I had to send the first pair back due to the fins splitting on both sides of the fins where the black area where your feet goes, meets the blue part of the fin. The second pair I now have are starting to split as well and I will be returning them. If the new pair split, I would request a refund and order a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great fins.
customer_reviews.text: All is gOOd with these fins: quality, fit, price; I'm very satisfied with them, would buy them again, and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 8 and the fit was right. And it picked up swim speed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect as stated for the size. The full boot was nice since there was no strap to break or become lose. Fits snug and well. These fins are soft though and do bend a lot, so don't expect full speed fast, these are more to cruising around calm waters.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Great for snorkeling but not the best for diving. Comfortable and light weight, they work well for casual snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Tri-Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used fins before but only when I was at a resort and renting them. Now I know why you'd want to buy your own. These things worked great and I can't believe have much propulsion these things give me with very small kicks. I'm still new to this, but I was pleasantly surprised how much I enjoyed using these. I would totally recommend these to anyone who'd want to buy some.
customer_reviews.author: N. Luong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 10.5 foot perfect. Excellent fins - easy to accelerate and good control for snorkleing. I like they wrap around heel sicne most fins being sold with packages do not. Comfortable for hours of snorkeling. They did rub my one toe a little bit on top and cause a little sore, but nothing that was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: U.S. Divers Proflex FX Snorkeling Set Size Large Mens & Womens Diving Fins with Mesh Carry Bag, Yellow
product_meta.description: Color:Yellow| Size:LargeGrab your gear, suit up, and set sail for an underwater adventure with these U.S. Divers ProFlex FX Snorkeling Set Size Large Diving Fins. If you want to maneuver quicker and more smoothly in the water, these snorkeling fins are the way to do it. Each flipper features a dual composite blade design that allows you to experience better snap and thrust in the water compared to other flippers. This pair is size large (men's 10-13 and women's 11.5-13.5), and using the comfort foot pocket and adjustable gel strap ensures a secure and comfortable fit every single time. You can also transport and store your fins in the handy mesh carry bag. From the freshwater to the saltwater, get a better swimming and diving experience with these ProFlex FX fins from U.S. Divers.
feature_bullets: BETTER MOVEMENT IN THE WATER: Full blade fins designed to allow for better swimming and diving
COMFORTABLE, SNUG FITTING: Features a soft and comfortable foot pocket and adjustable gel strap
IMPROVED SNAP & THRUST: The dual-composite blade allows for improved snap and thrust in the water
CONVENIENT MESH CARRY BAG: Comes with a handy mesh carry bag to prevent mold and mildew as flippers dry
UNISEX SIZE LARGE: Size large design (men's 10-13 and women's 11.5-13.5)
